trans-unit.source: unidic-lite, a 2013 version of Unidic that's relatively small
trans-unit.target: unidic-lite，2013年版本的Unidic，相对较小

trans-unit.source: unidic, the latest UniDic 2.3.0, which is 1GB on disk and requires a separate download step
trans-unit.target: unidic，最新的UniDic 2.3.0，磁盘上为1GB，需要单独的下载步骤

trans-unit.source: issueを英語で書く必要はありません。
trans-unit.target: 问题を英语で书く必要はありません。

trans-unit.source: A Cython MeCab wrapper for fast, pythonic Japanese tokenization.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于快速、pythonic日语标记化的Cython MeCab封装器。

trans-unit.source: Alternatives
trans-unit.target: 替代品

trans-unit.source: Dictionary Use
trans-unit.target: 词典使用

trans-unit.source: Fugashi is a Cython wrapper for MeCab, a Japanese tokenizer and morphological analysis tool. Wheels are provided for Linux, OSX, and Win64, and UniDic is easy to install.
trans-unit.target: Fugashi是MeCab的Cython包装器，MeCab是日本的标记器和形态分析工具。提供了适用于Linux，OSX和Win64的滚轮，UniDic易于安装。

trans-unit.source: Fugashi is a wrapper for MeCab, and Fugashi wheels include MeCab binaries. MeCab is copyrighted free software by Taku Kudo <taku@chasen.org> and Nippon Telegraph and Telephone Corporation, and is redistributed under the BSD License.
trans-unit.target: Fugashi是MeCab的包装，并且Fugashi轮子包括MeCab二进制文件。MeCab是Taku Kudo <taku@chasen.org> 和Nippon Telegraph and Telephone Corporation的受版权保护的免费软件，并根据BSD许可进行了重新分发。

trans-unit.source: Fugashi is released under the terms of the MIT license. Please copy it far and wide.
trans-unit.target: Fugashi是根据MIT许可的条款发布的。请广泛复制。

trans-unit.source: Fugashi is written with the assumption you'll use Unidic to process Japanese, but it supports arbitrary dictionaries.
trans-unit.target: Fugashi的编写是假设你会使用Unidic来处理日语,但它支持任意字典。

trans-unit.source: Fugashi requires a dictionary. UniDic is recommended, and two easy-to-install versions are provided.
trans-unit.target: Fugashi需要字典。建议使用UniDic，并提供两个易于安装的版本。

trans-unit.source: If you are on an unsupported platform (like PowerPC), you'll need to install MeCab first. It's recommended you install from source.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的平台不受支持（例如PowerPC），则需要先安装MeCab。建议您从源代码安装。

trans-unit.source: If you don't want to deal with installing MeCab at all, try SudachiPy.
trans-unit.target: 如果您根本不想安装MeCab，请尝试SudachiPy。

trans-unit.source: If you have a problem with Fugashi feel free to open an issue. However, there are some cases where it might be better to use a different library.
trans-unit.target: 如果你在使用Fugashi时遇到问题,请随时打开一个问题。然而,在某些情况下,使用其他库可能会更好。

trans-unit.source: If you just want to make sure things work you can start with unidic-lite, but for more serious processing unidic is recommended. For production use you'll generally want to generate your own dictionary too; for details see the MeCab documentation.
trans-unit.target: 如果您只是想确保一切正常，可以从 unidic-lite 开始，但是对于更严重的处理，建议使用 unidic 。对于生产用途，您通常也希望生成自己的字典。有关详细信息，请参阅MeCab文档。

trans-unit.source: If you need to work with Korean, try KoNLPy.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要使用韩语，请尝试KoNLPy。

trans-unit.source: If you're using a dictionary besides Unidic you can use the GenericTagger like this:
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用的是Unidic以外的字典,你可以像这样使用GenericTagger。

trans-unit.source: Installing a Dictionary
trans-unit.target: 安装词典

trans-unit.source: License and Copyright Notice
trans-unit.target: 许可和版权声明

trans-unit.source: See the blog post for background on why Fugashi exists and some of the design decisions.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅博客文章以获取有关Fugashi存在的背景以及一些设计决策的背景信息。

trans-unit.source: To get either of these dictionaries, you can install them directly using pip or do the below:
trans-unit.target: 要获取这些词典中的任何一个，您可以使用 pip 直接安装它们， 或执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 使用方法

trans-unit.source: You can also create a dictionary wrapper to get feature information as a named tuple.
trans-unit.target: 你也可以创建一个字典包装器,以命名元组的形式获取特征信息。

trans-unit.source: fugashi
trans-unit.target: 伐木
